item.title: Tree strap broken, 20th August
item.description:
The young Italian alder circled in the image (sorry for poor paint attempt, as streetview was before the tree was planted!) has broken free from its tree strap. Someone has tied a makeshift black "strap" around it. It blows to and fro in the wind. It is also missing its green watering sack and generally looks neglected - I know that when trees look neglected they are more susceptible to vandalism etc. Please can you attend and make good ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Upper Saint Martin's Lane, Bloomsbury, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on reverse of Upper St Martin's Lane sign, 20th August
item.description:
Graffiti on reverse of Upper St Martin's Lane sign. Outside Orion House. This sign is often swung around the wrong way, and has already had graffiti removed in the past. Please can it be permanently affixed to the wall of Orion House so that there is a permanent solution to this problem ? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Upper Saint Martin's Lane, Bloomsbury, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Carlton Vale NW6, 20th August
item.description:
The Whole Road has NOT been Swept in Weeks. The Litter is HORRENDOUS. When you Complain online the Street Cleaner who is sent MOANS and COMPLAINS although they are being PAID. Brent Council NEEDS to REVIEW the Street Cleaning as the Streets and Roads are FLITHY with LITTER and RUBBISH. The Service has been REDUCED and yet MORae Flats are being Built. What has happened to the Caretakers, Estate Cleaners? They have ALL DISAPPEARED. Residents are PAYING for there Streets and Road to be kept Clean. This is NOT happening. Itâ€™s DISGRACEFUL to walk along Carlton Vale and See ALL This Litter that has NOT been touched by ANY Street Cleaner.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
